The officials also raided 10 other places in Punjab. The central agency is investigating a money laundering case based on a first information report registered in 2018 by the Punjab Police against a person called Kudrat Deep Singh, The Indian Express reported.Kudrat Deep Singh owns a quarry in Nawanshahr town of Shaheed Bhagat  Singh Nagar district in Punjab. Channiâ€™s  nephew Bhupinder Singh Honey is reportedly a director at one of the companies formed by Kudrat Deep Singh.According to the FIR, a total of 26 people have been booked in the case. In 2018, the police had found 30 trucks carrying sand from area where mining was illegal.  The raids on the chief ministerâ€™s nephew come weeks before Punjab Assembly elections scheduled to take place on February 20.
